response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we understand its potential worth to you. We are offering it to you at a special price of $1,300,000, which we believe is a fair compromise considering its intrinsic value and your appreciation for it. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and allows us to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties. Should you be interested, please let us know promptly so we can proceed with the details.", "product_price": 1300000}
